pages.text:
Host Unforgettable Events at
Farm of Dreams Resort
Discover the perfect venues for your special occasions at Farm of Dreams Resort. We offer two exceptional buildings ready to host small events, gatherings, or intimate weddings.
The Activity Center:
Our first venue is a charming screened-in pavilion spanning approximately 1,500 square feet. It features a beautiful working fireplace, wood high-top tables, a conventional couch area, a bar service, a spacious 500-square-foot commercial kitchen, and convenient bathroom facilities. This versatile space is perfect for a variety of events, whether it's a family reunion, a birthday celebration, or an intimate wedding.
The Reception Hall:
Our second venue is a spacious 2,000-square-foot activity center, built with 180-degree glass windows to view nature’s natural beauty, complete with modern bathroom facilities. Inside, you'll find two additional rooms, perfect for a Bride and Groom to prepare and relax before their special day. This center provides an elegant backdrop for events that require a touch of sophistication.
Flexible Event Hosting:
We understand the importance of flexibility in event planning. Special events can take place concurrently with RV site rentals. If it's a community event and you have guests already staying here, no extra charges will be added. We believe in creating a seamless and enjoyable experience for all our guests.
Other Available Rentals:
In addition to the above rentals, we also have a large smoker and grill area, and golf carts available to rent at the office during your stay.
At Farm of Dreams Resort, we're here to turn your events into unforgettable memories. Click the button below to inquire about availability and start planning your next gathering in the heart of nature.

Frequently Asked Questions
What is your cancellation policy?
We are a small resort with limited rental spots, so we must maintain our cancellation policy.
The cancellation policy is as follows: a 100% refund, less a $10 booking fee, is available when canceled 30 days in advance of check-in. A 50% refund is available when canceled 8-29 days in advance of check-in. There will be no refunds for cancellations 7 days or less before check-in.
Refund requests must be submitted by phone. No refunds are given based on weather conditions unless the facility has been officially closed due to severe weather.
Is the camping resort pet-friendly?
Yes! We have a pet park available for guest use and our four-legged friends.
Do I need to make a reservation in advance?
We highly recommend making a reservation. You may book
at this link
.
Are campfires allowed, and can I purchase firewood on-site?
Yes and yes! You can purchase firewood at the resort office. Please note that it cannot be brought into the wooded areas. Please remember to put your fire out when you step away from your campsite. Because you can endanger those around you, this is one of the most important camping rules, regardless of where you go. Be sure to put out your fire before bed, before heading out for the day, or when you leave the site at the end of your stay. The general rule of thumb is to be sure the coals or ashes are cold.
Is Wi-Fi available at the camping resort?
We are located in a heavily wooded area with limited Wi-Fi access. Upon arrival, you will be given the Wi-Fi details.
Do you offer group camping options or facilities for events and gatherings?
Please
get in touch with us
directly
regarding your stay for large groups and gatherings.
What are the check-in and check-out times for accommodations and campsites?
Check-out is at 11:00 AM, and check-in time is at 3:00 PM.
Are there nearby attractions and activities outside the camping resort?
Yes, we are only 45 minutes from
Busch Gardens
,
Weeki Wachee Springs
, and
golf courses
. Please visit the websites for
Florida Adventure Coast
,
Nature Coaster
, and
Brooksville Main Street
to learn about local happenings here on the Adventure Coast.
